item.title: Unforgettable Moments and New Milestones: My First KubeCon Experience
item.description: Embarking on a journey to the United States for the first time, my anticipation was heightened by the fact that I will be giving my first international conference talk. Being awarded the Dan Kohn scholarship was not just a financial aid but a ticket to an experience that would unfold as a series of remarkable moments. The scholarship allowed me to be a part of KubeCon, a colossal event in the realm of Kubernetes and cloud-native technologies.
